title.narrative: 219547 WFP FY22 Tigray Crisis Supplementary Feeding Ethiopia

description.narrative:
WVUK Share 31.96%
7048 Beneficiaries 4049 children 6-59Months, 2999PLWs for whole project
Tigray Region: 11 Woredas in South and North West Tigray Raya Alamata, Alamata, Ofla, Korem town, Zata, Tahtay Adiyabo, Adidaero, Seyemti-Adiyabo, Maekel Adiyabo, Shraro IDP, Shiraro town (host)
The TSF activities will address and contribute on the following specific objectives
- To prevent further deterioration of Acute Malnutrition through supplementary feeding.
- To improve the screening coverage and increase CMAM service uptakes.
- To contribute in the reduction of morbidity and mortality rates of the under-five children and pregnant and lactating women through sustainable health and nutrition treatments and awareness.
- To improve the survival as well as the nutrition and health status of children, pregnant and lactating mothers through provision of outreach health activities, screening, blanket & targeted supplementary food and nutrition education.
Strengthen the capacities of the Woredas to manage acute malnutrition
